Intro JS: This website uses Intro JS to give the user a brief tour of the whereabouts of the website when a page is loaded. Want to see this in action? Hit the '?' button at the bottom-right of the page.

Tooltips: Want to know purpose of any button or component, just hover mouse cursor over that element for 1 second (you have to be a bit desperate to see the tooltip :-)) and there pops a tooltip with info about that component.

Color Theme: Don't like the default theme applied on page load? Visit the 'Customize' dropdown and apply a new theme from a set of defined themes. Want more? You can even switch to vertical layout to have more screen area.
